text: Peter Dean Gordeno (born 20 February 1964) is an English songwriter, producer and multi-instrumentalist. Since 1998, he has performed with Depeche Mode. He plays keyboard parts on some songs. He also sings some backing vocals and plays bass guitar. He and Andrew Phillpott were backing musicians with Martin Gore on a short tour called "A Night with Martin L.
